input.sentences: i 'm not very good at forcing a smile .

careful the birthday cake is hot .

output.sentences: The party was not very fun as you can see by the fact that most of the guests are forcing a smile in these photos.
This guy might be the only one who had a genuinely good time.
The host didn't offer any food to the hungry guests.
The only food the host offered was the cake the hot girl would jump out of and most people were careful not to eat that.
Besides the hot girl in the cake the only other fun thing at the party was blowing into the noise maker thingies.
